title: Things Every Goddess Should Know
description: Because being a goddess is not about being perfect . . .You donâ€™t have to be perfect to be a goddess. The goddesses in mythology where usually pretty messed up in many ways. Being a goddess is about finding your potential; not being perfect. Every woman has the potential to be wonderful. This is the guide book to help you on your way to goddess-hood. Full of advice, knowledge and helpful hints on being the best goddess you can be. It includes sections on relationships, self improvement, money and much more.
author: E.J. Divitt
